block.p: AUTO RACING NASCAR -- Suspended David Lackey, crew chief, and Ken Alexander, car owner, until June 7 for actions deemed detrimental to stock car racing and using unofficial fuel. Penalized Alexander six Busch series owners' points.

American League ANAHEIM ANGELS -- Sent C Bret Hemphill outright to Edmonton of the PCL. TEXAS RANGERS -- Activated INF Frank Catalanotto from the 15-day disabled list. Placed INF Tom Evans on the 15-day disabled list. Sent OF Rusty Greer to Tulsa of the Texas League on a rehab assignment. Named Bobby Jones coach.

AUTO RACING NASCAR -- Suspended David Lackey, crew chief, and Ken Alexander, car owner, until June 7 for actions deemed detrimental to stock car racing and using unofficial fuel. Penalized Alexander six Busch series owners' points.

American League ANAHEIM ANGELS -- Sent C Bret Hemphill outright to Edmonton of the PCL. TEXAS RANGERS -- Activated INF Frank Catalanotto from the 15-day disabled list. Placed INF Tom Evans on the 15-day disabled list. Sent OF Rusty Greer to Tulsa of the Texas League on a rehab assignment. Named Bobby Jones coach.

National League CINCINNATI REDS -- Traded RHP Gene Altman to the Milwaukee Brewers to complete the deal for OF Alex Ochoa. SAN DIEGO PADRES -- Activated OF Tony Gwynn from the 15-day disabled list. Optioned INF-OF John Roskos to Las Vegas of the PCL.
National Basketball Association NBA -- Named Jody Shapiro vice-president for business development, NBA new media and television ventures, and Milt Newton director of player personnel, new league.
Women's National Basketball Association ORLANDO MIRACLE -- Waived F Kym Hope. SACRAMENTO MONARCHS -- Waived G Tara Williams.

National Football League DETROIT LIONS -- Re-signed DT Kelvin Pritchett. NEW ORLEANS SAINTS -- Named James Jefferson area scout and Ricky Porter director of player development and community relations. SEATTLE SEAHAWKS -- Named Bucky Brooks and Mike Murphy area scouts. TAMPA BAY BUCCANEERS -- Re-signed S Damien Robinson to a one-year contract.

AKRON -- Named Mike Rodriguez interim athletic director. COLORADO STATE -- Named Bill Peterson and Buzz Williams men's assistant basketball coaches. GEORGIA -- Announced the resignation of Beans Kelly, women's golf coach. INDIANA -- Suspended Bobby Knight, men's basketball coach, for three games, fined him $30,000, and ordered him to follow a strict conduct code. MAINE -- Named Sharon Versyp women's basketball coach. MOUNT HOLYOKE -- Named Kristen Martini women's soccer coach, Kristen Eberhart women's volleyball coach, and Megan Henry women's basketball coach. ROCHESTER -- Named Cindy Cohen associate director of athletics. ST. LAWRENCE -- Named Jeffrey Pier alpine ski coach, Robert Clemmer men's and women's swim coach, and Kenneth Baker associate director of media relations.
